text: khanditavagiyu, maryamara putra masihane allahanendu helidavaru dhikkarigalagi bittaru. Nijavagi masiharu (isa a.) Hige heliddaru; isra'ilara santatigale, nanna odeyanu nim'ma odeyanu agiruva allahananne nivu aradhisiri. Allahana jote yarannadaru serisuvavana palige allahanu khanditavagiyu svargavannu nisid'dhagolisiruvanu mattu narakave avana neleyagiruvudu. Akramigala palige yaru sahayakarilla
